0.2.0.name: connect20/Ifuturz_Notforsale
0.2.0.description: Some clients need to restrict their specific products for sale to specific states. This extension will let you restrict your products for sale to US states.

suggest.magento-hackathon\/magento-composer-inst: Allows to manage this package as a dependency
